original_title: Пять причин не влюбиться в казаха
overview: After studying abroad, the willful and independent Dinara plans to marry the Frenchman Jules. Parents don't like her choice, so the heroine gives money to the cab driver Darkhan, who has to pretend to be her boyfriend with a horrible temper. In this way, mom and dad might change their opinion about the french guy.
title: Five Reasons Not to Fall in Love with a Kazakh
